This Privacy
Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded
by here.news and how we use it.

This Privacy
Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded
by here.news and how we use it.

Information We Collect

We collect information in the following ways:  
  
Information you provide to us: This includes information you enter when you
create an account, such as your name, email address, and any other contact or
personal information you choose to provide.

Information automatically collected: When you visit here.news, we may
automatically collect certain information about your device, including
information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the
cookies that are installed on your device.
